html: #DidYouKnow: Before the #TaxCutsandJobsAct, if you had a 529 account saved for college education, the tax code didn't allow you to transfer your savings into tax-free #ABLEAccounts if your child developed a severe disability. Today, thanks to #taxreform families have that option.
text: #DidYouKnow: Before the #TaxCutsandJobsAct, if you had a 529 account saved for college education, the tax code didn't allow you to transfer your savings into tax-free #ABLEAccounts if your child developed a severe disability. Today, thanks to #taxreform families have that option.
